description: This file contains SQL migration scripts for initializing the database schema of an airport passenger service platform. It defines extensions, functions, types, and tables related to administration, passengers, KYC, chatbots, flights, facilities, bookings, feedback, grievances, notifications, and audit events, along with relevant indexes and triggers.
external_files: None explicitly referenced as external files

methods.name: set_updated_at
methods.description: A trigger function that updates the 'updated_at' timestamp column to the current timestamp whenever a row is updated.
